notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), K.T.; methodology, A.K. (Anna Kirsteina), J.B., J.J., I.I.-S., V.M., D.M.; software, A.K. (Anna Kirsteina), I.I.-S.; validation, A.K. (Anna Kirsteina), I.I.-S.; formal analysis, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), K.T.; investigation, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), A.K. (Anna Kirsteina), I.A., J.B., I.L., J.J., D.S., T.K. (Tatjana Kazaka), I.I.-S., D.M., T.K. (Tatiana Kotomina), V.M.; data curation, A.K. (Anna Kirsteina); writing—Original draft preparation, A.K. (Anna Kirsteina); writing—Review and editing, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), I.I.-S.; supervision, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), K.T.; project administration, A.K. (Andris Kazaks), L.R.; funding acquisition, A.K. (Andris Kazaks). All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
